subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With four starters on the disabled list, the Mets will need Steve Trachsel to pitch as well as he did Wednesday night, limiting the National League Central Division-leading Cardinals to one run on four hits over seven innings.
snippet: With four starters on the disabled list, the Mets will need Steve Trachsel to pitch as well as he did Wednesday night, limiting the National League Central Division-leading Cardinals to one run on four hits over seven innings.
